

```swift
This is a multiline
text stored as a
string in Swift.
"""
```

Define a variable to store the details of a meeting schedule.
code:
```swift
struct MeetingSchedule {
    var title: String
    var date: String
    var time: String
    var location: String
    var participants: [String]
}

let meetingDetails = MeetingSchedule(title: "Project Update", 
                                     date: "2023-10-15", 
                                     time: "10:00 AM", 
                                     location: "Conference Room A", 
                                     participants: ["Alice", "Bob", "Charlie"])
```
